vogar

Class XmlReportPrinter

  • java.lang.Object
    • vogar.XmlReportPrinter

  • public class XmlReportPrinter
extends java.lang.Object
    Writes JUnit results to a series of XML files in a format consistent with Ant's XMLJUnitResultFormatter.

    Unlike Ant's formatter, this class does not report the execution time of tests. TODO: unify this and com.google.coretests.XmlReportPrinter
